sentences.en: But poking fun at some of these inane situations can perhaps alleviate some of that distress.
sentences.cn: 然而在那样空虚的环境里找寻到幽默有助于缓解部分压力.

sentences.en: He always had this inane grin.
sentences.cn: 他总是这样傻傻地咧嘴笑。

sentences.en: Most pop lyrics are pretty inane.
sentences.cn: 大部分流行歌曲的歌词都相当空洞。

sentences.en: Progress is the eternal as eternity and is posited on action not inaction through inane waiting.
sentences.cn: 发展是不朽的永恒,定位于行动,而非空洞等待的怠惰.

sentences.en: She made up her mind that their lives were, though luxurious, inane.
sentences.cn: 她坚决相信,他们的生活虽然奢侈, 但很空虚.

sentences.en: She started asking me inane questions.
sentences.cn: 她开始问我愚蠢的问题。

sentences.en: Should investors beyond inane chatter of the day - trading blogosphere care?
sentences.cn: 日间交易闲聊圈外的投资者在意 吗 ?

sentences.en: Such comments are inane because they don't help us solve our problem.
sentences.cn: 这种评论纯属空洞之词,不能帮助我们解决问题.

sentences.en: The inane promise of consummation cannot attract people to around the Wheel of Law any longer.
sentences.cn: 再靠着“天天望梅,年年画饼”,承诺遥遥无期的“圆满”,已经不能凝聚“轮心”了.

sentences.en: Then, wool pulls wag one's headingly cook up a few, already inane, lack lasting appeal again.
sentences.cn: 于是, 毛拉摇头晃脑地胡诌了几句, 既空洞无物, 又缺乏韵味.

sentences.en: Theories deviating practices are inane , while practices deviating theories are blindfold.
sentences.cn: 脱离实践的理论是空泛的, 脱离理论指导的实践是盲目的.

sentences.en: Twisted , inane , represented the essense of CCTV in a very visual way.
sentences.cn:  で斩矗苄蜗蟮乇硐至荟CTV的 精华特点.

words.tran_cn: 空虚；营养不足；死气沉沉

trans.tran_en: very stupid or without much meaning
